revenue.notes: Blackwell Data Center revenue grew 17% sequentially and GB300 production ramped

gross_margin.notes: Includes a $180M release of prior H20 reserves plus $650M of unrestricted H20 sales

operating_expenses.notes: Reflects higher compute infrastructure, compensation and benefit investments

net_income.notes: Income lifted by the release of H20 reserves while no China H20 shipments were assumed

operating_expenses.notes: Excludes stock-based compensation, acquisition, and other costs

net_income.notes: Non-GAAP excludes the $180M H20 release adjustment

eps.notes: 1.04 excluding H20 related charge/release and tax impact

highlights: Blackwell Data Center revenue grew 17% sequentially; GB300 production shipments accelerated after the seamless GB200 ramp
No H20 shipments to China, but $180M release of reserved inventory and $650M of unrestricted H20 sales supported the quarter
Rubin platform timing remains on track while NVLink 144 and Spectrum-XGS continue to support AI factory build-outs
Blackwell-powered GeForce RTX 5060 family and DLSS 4 adoption fueled record gaming revenue and improved supply
GeForce Now expanded with Install-to-Play and 4,500-title catalog; OpenAI models optimized for RTX PCs

Professional_Visualization.notes: RTX PRO 4000/2000 Blackwell GPUs and Omniverse/RTX Pro servers drive adoption

Automotive_and_Robotics.notes: Thor SoC, DRIVE AGX, and Isaac GR00T platforms enable automakers and robotics pioneers

capital_return.notes: Returned $10B in the quarter; Board authorized an additional $60B buyback

cash_paid_pp&e.notes: Investing to expand GB200/GB300 production footprints, networking, and Omniverse compute

data_center_and_blackwell: GB200 NVLink72 racks remain the inference workhorse while GB300 samples transitioned into full production with 1,000 racks per week
Rubin roadmap remains on cadence as customers prepare for NVLink 144 scale-up, Spectrum-XGS, and Quantum-X silicon photonics interconnects
Blackwell Ultra revenue accelerated and AI factories across sovereigns/enterprises scaled tokens at 10k+ NVLink racks
networking: Networking revenue hit a record $7.3B led by Spectrum-X, Spectrum-XGS, NVLink Fusion, InfiniBand XDR, and NVLink switches with 130 TB/sec domains
Spectrum-X annualized revenue surpassed $10B and now includes Google Cloud, Meta, and global OEM collaborations
gaming_and_ai_pc: GeForce RTX 5060 desktops/laptops hit record ramp; DLSS 4 is live in 175+ games and arriving on Blackwell-powered GeForce NOW
Partnered with OpenAI and NVIDIA optimized GPT inference on RTX PCs, enabling fast local AI experiences
sovereign_and_physical_ai: Announced AI factories with European & Middle Eastern governments and the $500B Stargate-style infrastructure; OmniVerse/Digital Twin blueprints accelerate robotic/industrial operations
Automotive wins include Mercedes-Benz, GM, Hyundai and Jetson AGX Thor deployments while Isaac GR00T supports humanoid innovation

q3_guidance.other_income: ≈0.5 billion USD income excluding non-marketable equity gains
q3_guidance.notes: Guidance assumes no H20 shipments to China; targets mid-70s non-GAAP margin exit

full_year.operating_expenses: Expected to grow in the high-30s% range; CapEx will continue to fund AI factory and networking expansion
full_year.cash_flow: H20 adjustments and inventory tailwinds may continue to favor margins; onshore supply chain capacity remains a priority
